entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FREEZING FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FREEZING FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 30
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 11
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 7 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS 15 TO 20
LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
